/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. On the left side of the street, trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun is setting, casting long shadows and bathing everything in a soft, golden light. This image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes the city.
